reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Accelerating malaria control towards elimination by 2030

description.narrative: Philippines - Malaria - Pilipinas Shell Foundation, Inc. - PSFI. This program has the following goals: By 2022, to reduce malaria incidence in the Philippines by 90% relative to a 2016 baseline; and. To increase the number of malaria free provinces from 32 (in 2016) to 74 in 2022. The objectives of this program are: To ensure universal access to reliable diagnosis, highly effective and appropriate treatment and preventive measures for the period covering 2017 to 2022. To strengthen the capacity at all levels to manage and implement malaria interventions for the period covering 2017 to 2022. To secure government and non-government financing to sustain malaria control and elimination efforts at all levels for the period covering 2017 to 2022. To ensure quality malaria services, timely detection of infection and immediate response and information and evidence to guide malaria elimination for the period covering 2017 to 2022
